channel.title: Pet~pk~city(in editing)
channel.description:
[img]http://img87.imageshack.us/img87/6129/screenshot0143ln3fz5.jpg[/img] In progess and editing. server credits to me and Bulby Strife. This server will be ownage when I'm finished. :D Pets follow you too and come back to you. Commands: Owner/Co-Owner commands (jail,unjail),pickup,pick. MOD/ADMIN/OWNER Co-Owner ban,kick.
Pet List [sub]\/[/sub]
Owner pets: jaddy(hits mage,melee,range),zekky2
Regular player pets: zekky,xilly,xilly2,pkm4st3r,misquito,run3or3,dog,hellhound,greendrag,reddrag,blackdrag,kingdrag,bronzedrag, irondrag,steeldrag,pig,penguin,
Here are Server pictures. The pets attack your opponet when pking they're beast. Images can't be big so i have [u]safe[/u] links below.
Chillen. [url=http://img504.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot013gc9cn0.jpg]http://img504.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot013gc9cn0.jpg[/url]
Home. [url=http://img504.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot006qo9.jpg]http://img504.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot006qo9.jpg[/url]
Some pet pictures.
Xilly. [url=http://img220.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot012yi5.jpg]http://img220.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot012yi5.jpg[/url]
Mouse. [url=http://img504.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot011ug0.jpg]http://img504.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot011ug0.jpg[/url]
Jaddy and Penguin. [url=http://img101.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot010mk4.jpg]http://img101.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot010mk4.jpg[/url]
Penguin and Pig. [url=http://img101.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot009kg7.jpg]http://img101.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot009kg7.jpg[/url]
Rock. [url=http://img101.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot008fz2.jpg]http://img101.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot008fz2.jpg[/url]
Zekky2. [url=http://img504.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot007qq8.jpg]http://img504.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot007qq8.jpg[/url]
If you'd drop some [i]suggestions[/i] or tell me how you like it, that would be nice. I [i]might[/i] release when I'm done.
Thanks, BLOOD
